title: `install` should relay git annex output
body:
Getting a dataset on a slow USB stick in annex v6 mode:

```
% git clone https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git
Cloning into 'studyforrest-data-structural'...
remote: Counting objects: 1520, done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (3/3), done.
remote: Total 1520 (delta 1), reused 0 (delta 0), pack-reused 1517
Receiving objects: 100% (1520/1520), 132.19 KiB | 319.00 KiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (9/9), done.
Checking out files: 100% (213/213), done.
(datalad3-dev) 1 mih@meiner /media/mih/C799-BE4A/test % cd studyforrest-data-structural
(datalad3-dev) mih@meiner ...E4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural (git)-[master] % git annex init --version 6
init  
  Detected a filesystem without fifo support.

  Disabling ssh connection caching.

  Detected a crippled filesystem.
(merging origin/git-annex into git-annex...)
(recording state in git...)
(scanning for unlocked files...)

  Entering an adjusted branch where files are unlocked as this filesystem does not support locked files.

Checking out files: 100% (209/209), done.
Switched to branch 'adjusted/master(unlocked)'
download failed: Not Found

  Remote origin not usable by git-annex; setting annex-ignore
(Auto enabling special remote mddatasrc...)
ok
(recording state in git...)
git annex init --version 6  3.65s user 4.22s system 5% cpu 2:25.90 total
```

Cloning takes few seconds, almost all the time is spent on `annex init`.

Now an attempt to do the same with datalad:

```
% DATALAD_REPO_VERSION=6 datalad install -s https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git studyforrest-data-structural_alt      
[INFO   ] Cloning https://github.com/psychoinformatics-de/studyforrest-data-structural.git [1 other candidates] into '/media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt' 
install(ok): /media/mih/C799-BE4A/test/studyforrest-data-structural_alt (dataset)
DATALAD_REPO_VERSION=6 datalad install -s  studyforrest-data-structural_alt  4.46s user 4.87s system 5% cpu 2:36.36 total
```

No output whatsoever for 2 min 30s. Most people would probably think the beast has died (stick, datalad, or both).
